#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<map>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#define LL long long
#define P(N) printf("%d\n",N);
#define S(N) scanf("%d",&N);
#define pb push_back
using namespace std;
#define GETCHAR getchar_unlocked
#define PUTCHAR putchar_unlocked

inline void writeInt(int x)
{
     if(x==-1)
     {
              PUTCHAR('-');
              PUTCHAR('1');
              PUTCHAR('\n');
     }
     else
     {
       int i = 10;
       char buf[11];
      // buf[10] = 0;
      buf[10] = '\n';

     do
     {
        buf[--i] = x % 10 + '0';
        x/= 10;
     }while(x);
     do
     {
        PUTCHAR(buf[i]);
     } while (buf[i++] != '\n');
     }
}

inline int fastRead_int()
{
        int noRead=0;
        char p=getchar_unlocked();
        for(; p<33;) {
                p=getchar_unlocked();
        };
        while(p>32) {
                noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
                p=getchar_unlocked();
        }
        return noRead;
};


main()
{
    int test_Cases;
    int x;
    S(test_Cases);
    int num;
    while(test_Cases--)
    {
        //S(num);
        num=fastRead_int();
        x=sqrt(num);
        writeInt(x);
    }

return 0;
}
